data.title: Blessings Movie Night: The Dark Crystal
data.meta_description: Portland visual artist Eatcho curates this month’s Blessings Movie Night with an original live rescore to THE DARK CRYSTAL (1982) by returning local musician Pink Buddha.
data.text:
Portland visual artist Eatcho curates this month’s Blessings Movie Night with an original live rescore to THE DARK CRYSTAL (1982) by returning local musician Pink Buddha.

On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world. Directed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz.

Please note: This is not a typical screening. An improvised live score will accompany the film. Remember to be kind and chill.
